allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add product definition and screen designs for TriageCall Analyser

- Product overview, roadmap, data model, and design system
- Screen designs for all 5 sections: Authentication, Call Input,
  Analysis Results, Scorecard, and History
- Application shell with header, footer bar, and user menu
- Design tokens: teal/emerald palette with Inter typography

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
